DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesis local activation endogenous Lp-PLA2 play integral role early atherosclerosis , contribute mechanism coronary endothelial dysfunction structural mechanical property characterize plaque vulnerability . Thus , study characterize prospectively correlation functional structural vascular wall property , activity Lp-PLA2 pathway .
DOC.detailed_description: The present study substudy National Institute Health ( NIH ) fund Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) approve ( 08-008161 ) protocol `` Lp-PLA2 Coronary Atherosclerosis Humans '' ( 10-000044 ) `` Lp-PLA2 Coronary Atherosclerosis Humans AIM III '' investigator examine impact long-term inhibition Lp-PLA2 , specific novel inhibitor , LpPLA2 activity improvement coronary endothelial function . The substudy allow investigator also examine additional endpoint lipid core content atherosclerotic plaque hence plaque vulnerability . Plaque lipid composition measure use LipiScan LipiScan IVUS catheter ( InfraReDx NIRS ( Near Infrared Spectroscopy ) System without IVUS ( Intra Vascular Ultrasound ) capability ) baseline 6 month follow Lp-PLA2 inhibition . The study provide insight role endogenous Lp-PLA2 early coronary atherosclerosis , potential therapeutic target early coronary atherosclerosis human .
DOC.criteria: patient age > 18 year < 85 year refer cardiac catheterization laboratory coronary vasomotion test subsequently find coronary endothelial dysfunction . heart failure ejection fraction < 40 % , unstable angina myocardial infarction angioplasty within 6 month prior entry study use investigational agent within 1 month entry study patient require treatment positive inotropic agent digoxin study patient cerebrovascular accident within 6 month prior entry study significant endocrine , hepatic renal , disorder , local systemic infectious disease within 4 week prior entry study pregnancy lactation mental instability
